I20070625-1500

Found in the log some time after using the Quick Access dialog. I've installed the WST features just before.

I can't parse the code line where this happened:
    	List adapters = new ArrayList(Arrays.asList(Platform.getAdapterManager().computeAdapterTypes(object.getClass())));

Please use 'Refactor > Extract Local Variable' to get more precise error locations ... ;-)
